item.title: Welcome to my Blog
item.description: Why? I always wanted to have a place where I can share longform writing without the restrictions of the mainstream plaftorms (like Medium, Wordpress and others) or the hassle of maintaining a self-hosted blogging platform like WordPress.org or Ghost and having to deal with security vulnerabilities. What am I gonna post here? Tutorials that are requested on my Discord and some helpful information that can be used to educational purposes, either in the gaming, streaming or software development world.
